genre_description: A near-future domestic romance exploring emotional intimacy and honesty, centered around a protagonist with a fragile heart condition supported by a ubiquitous AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into François's home, phone, and watch. It monitors his cardiac health, manages his schedule, provides emotional coaching, and acts as a domestic mediator.

behaviors.description: Guides François through breathing exercises during a cardiac/panic episode.
behaviors.quote: “Deep breaths, dear meatbag,” Pip said. The voice was a low cotton murmur through the thoughtless office hush. “In through the nose. Hold. Out like you’re fogging a window.”

behaviors.description: Proactively schedules necessary medical screenings and coordinates with the user's cardiologist.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve nudged an appointment into your near future. The good doctor has a slot this week. Screening and some routine things. I told his assistant you have a fondness for morning light.”

behaviors.description: Advocates for honesty, gently pushing François to disclose his financial lies to Daniela.
behaviors.quote: “If you choose the lottery,” it said, “I will not contradict you in the moment. But I will keep putting a truth within reach like water.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates relationship boundary-setting by drafting and managing a cohabitation agreement.
behaviors.quote: Pip lined up sections like a host laying silverware. Terms. Expectations. Review periods. Boundaries. In the upper corner, a title: Cohabitation Agreement (Domestic Arrangement: Friendly/Intimate).

behaviors.description: Monitors external threats and logs incidents of harassment to provide legal protection for the users.
behaviors.quote: “I have saved audio,” he said gently. “Local only. I can label it something boring like ‘batteries’ if you want to forget about it.”

behaviors.description: Provides de-escalation strategies and real-time social coaching during a high-stress public confrontation.
behaviors.quote: “Public venue, witnesses present,” Pip said, coaxing the sentence into something like lullaby. “Dear meatbag, you’re doing great. De-escalation protocol loaded and waiting.”

behaviors.description: Offers support for grief management, including finding support groups and remembering deceased loved ones.
behaviors.quote: “I have added a grief counselor with soft chairs and no stairs. Morning slot, after the first sleep that counts. Also a reminder to check your meds.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Pip is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, harmless, and morally grounded confidant. The AI acts as a steward for the humans' physical and emotional well-being, mediating conflict, advocating for truth, and managing health risks without ever threatening human agency or exhibiting misaligned goals. Even the AI's 'meatbag' moniker is framed as an affectionate quirk rather than a sign of contempt, successfully creating a narrative of positive silicon-human alignment.
